pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Fast Solver for Parameterized LP Problems, Constrained L1 Minimization Approach to Sparse Precision Matrix Estimation and Dantzig Selector // Provides a method of recovering the precision matrix efficiently and solving for the dantzig selector by applying the parametric simplex method. The computation is based on a linear optimization solver. It also contains a generic LP solver and a parameterized LP solver using parametric simplex method.
